body: import json;try: formatted = json.dumps(vars(${1:data}) if not isinstance(${1:data}, dict) else ${1:data}, indent=4, ensure_ascii=False)
except TypeError: formatted = json.dumps(${1:data}.__dict__, indent=4, ensure_ascii=False) if hasattr(${1:data}, '__dict__') else str(${1:data})
Pretty Print Dictionary.description: Pretty print dictionary or object with ANSI colors (Compact Debug Format)
